description.displayText: I'm not sure where to start. Keren has changed our lives. My partner and I work full time and have two small children and live in the city. Our apartment was a mess and we were overwhelmed. We found Keren on Care.com and she came over the next day and made everything better - organized, scrubbed, and made our home feel calm and wonderful. She often knows what we need before we do. I sometimes text her when I can't find something and she knows where it is. When we run out of a cleaning supply, she'll offer to pick it up for us. Also, Keren loves our kids and they love her. She often cares for them when we want a date night, and she checks in and play with them even when she's off the clock. I could go on, but the bottom line is that we trust and adore Keren - we are just so grateful for her.

description.displayText: Keren is great with our kids, ages 9 and 12. She's a really good combination of warm and fun with them, but also strong and stern when needed. She's incredibly dependable, and easy to interact with. I'd highly recommend her.
description.originalText: Keren is great with our kids, ages 9 and 12. She's a really good combination of warm and fun with them, but also strong and stern when needed. She's incredibly dependable, and easy to interact with. I'd highly recommend her.

description.displayText: Keren is amazing! She's been a huge help to our family,  both as date night babysitter and with housekeeping. She is completely dependable,  reliable and also kind and upbeat -- a pleasure to work with! We plan to continue working with Keren and highly recommend her.
description.originalText: Keren is amazing! She's been a huge help to our family,  both as date night babysitter and with housekeeping. She is completely dependable,  reliable and also kind and upbeat -- a pleasure to work with! We plan to continue working with Keren and highly recommend her.

description.displayText: I met Keren through Care.com, and I honestly made the best decision to hire her. She is always on time and very helpful when it comes to my 6 month old child Jefferson. Keren always follows my instructions and respects my wishes in regards to feeding, sleeping, bathing, and other activities, etc. I trust her very much. I have left the city a few times due to work and have left my son in her care. She is very responsible and 100 percent reliable. I happy to recommend Keren to anyone looking for a loving, responsible, fun person to care for their child.

description.displayText: Keren was amazing! She is a wonderful babysitter. She babysat for me during the summer and recently. She was very helpful with our 3 girls ages 5 months, 3 and 6. I know she has experience with newborns and up. She has babysat from me and my friends for a long time. I highly recommend Keren.

I know she has experience with newborns and up. She has babysat from me and my friends for a long time. I highly recommend Keren.

description.displayText: Keren was a wonderful help with my 6 mos old daughter. She was always very punctual, responsible, communicative and went above and beyond at all times. I would highly recommend her!
description.originalText: Keren was a wonderful help with my 6 mos old daughter. She was always very punctual, responsible, communicative and went above and beyond at all times. I would highly recommend her!

description.displayText: Keren has been babysitting for us for 5 months as an occasional sitter. She has been very good with my 7 year old son and they have a good relationship. She is often early, never late. She has also been a great help tidying up and helping keep the kitchen and other areas of the house in order. I would recommend her as a sitter.
description.originalText: Keren has been babysitting for us for 5 months as an occasional sitter. She has been very good with my 7 year old son and they have a good relationship. She is often early, never late. She has also been a great help tidying up and helping keep the kitchen and other areas of the house in order. I would recommend her as a sitter.

description.displayText: Keren is a wonderful babysitter. She babysat for me twice and was very helpful with our 3 girls ages 10, 7 and 3. I know she has experience from newborn and up. She babysat for my friend for a long time and was very helpful. I highly recommend her!
description.originalText: Keren is a wonderful babysitter. She babysat for me twice and was very helpful with our 3 girls ages 10, 7 and 3. I know she has experience from newborn and up. She babysat for my friend for a long time and was very helpful. I highly recommend her!

description.displayText:
We are privileged to employ Keren as our babysitting. She has been with us for 4 years. Keren has been a reliable, fun, loving and hardworking full-time babysitting for my children since they were just infants. Keren has literally seen our 3 year old daughter and 4 year old son grow up. Keren has work for us during the summer and sometimes throughout the year. She has a good understanding of the needs and abilities of children and is warm, nurturing and responsive to our children. My children love her and love spending time with her. Keren is always ready to engage the children with fun activities indoor or outdoor. You can be assured that you won't get a teenager who lunges around watching tv while your kids fend for themselves. Keren is fun with children and any family that hires her has very fortunate children indeed!

Sincerely,

Tracy M.

description.displayText:
To Whom It May concern: 

It is with great pleasure that I write a review for Keren A. as a babysitter. She watched my two children (an infant and 3 year old) four times a week and it was a joy to have her. Keren always came to our home on time, cheerful and ready to engage the children with creative art and other enriching activities. She is a great listener. My children love Keren and look forward to spending time with her. She always followed our directions in regard to the children (bedtimes, food, activities). Many of my personal friends have hired Keren as a babysitter in their homes and they end up loving her. Keren can fulfill a variety of tasks and performed her duty well specially in taking care if my children. Not only as a babysitter but as a well organized housekeeper. Our family has moved to another state for good, but I am confident that Keren can find another employer and can be a very trustful person for your family. 

Thank you,

Frances B.
